worksheetPreview.title: 15 Times table chart
worksheetPreview.body: The 15 times table is a crucial part of a student's math skills. It is particularly helpful in calculations involving time and reading clocks. It involves multiplying 15 by various whole numbers. Every product in the 15x table is a multiple of 5. Knowing the 15 x table helps develop mental math skills, understanding of ratio and proportion, and mastery of multiplication and division. Proficiency in the 15x table boosts confidence and is valuable in real-life situations like calculating discounts or currency exchange. Interestingly, every product in the 15 times table ends in either 0 or 5. See the fifteen times table below.

explainerCards.title: Making teaching simple
explainerCards.body: AstroSafe makes the job of organising and creating lessons quick and simple. So teachers can spend more time teaching and less time on prep.

cards.title: Teachers
cards.text: For teachers looking for a quick and easy way to prepare curriculum aligned lessons, AstroSafe makes creating a worksheet as simple as clicking a button.

cards.title: Tutors
cards.text: Tutors can easily curate worksheets to appropriate level for each of their students. Personalised worksheet creation has never been simpler and quicker.

cards.title: Parents
cards.text: AstroSafe makes it simple to support your child at home by allowing parents to make classroom-grade worksheets at a click of a button.
